translation.en: Good.

translation.es: Desde esta altura parece que los policías

translation.es: Terminé involucrado en esto porque Joe quería dar un golpepara probar que aún era capaz.

translation.es: Este es mi barrio. Si nos culpan

translation.en: but after what you did to Joe, fuck you, we're fighting!

translation.es: La policía viene hacia acá,el equipo ha muerto

translation.es: si seguía en el cuarto de seguridadcuando salías de la bodega?

translation.en: You didn't know?

translation.en: -Griffie! -[gasps]

translation.es: Frank.

translation.en: Over there.

translation.en: Easy.

translation.en: I don't even know what it is.

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.es: Demonios.

translation.en: You'll never know if you shoot me.

translation.en: For once, I'm glad you didn't listen.

translation.en: Try to stay focused, Frank.

translation.en: Must run in the family.

translation.en: You gotta be shitting me.

translation.en: All wrapped up, neat with a bow.

translation.en: But you couldn't leave well enough alone.

translation.en: Gotta give it to you, though.

translation.en: Why?

translation.en: Five hundred grand doesn't begin to cover the markers he owed.

translation.en: You've been playing me this whole time.

translation.en: I did save your ass from Ivory, didn't I?

translation.en: I just didn't expect you to come calling earlier today.
translation.es: No esperaba que vinierasa buscarme en la mañana.

translation.en: But I rode along, watched you hunt down the rest of the guys.

translation.en: -Thanks, babe. -Mm-hmm.
translation.es: Gracias, amor.

translation.en: Thank you.

translation.es: Si nuestra posición principalestá en riesgo, tengo dos alternativas.

translation.en: Now, I'm gonna have two getaway cars

translation.en: positioned at the north end of the alley just off of Fifth Street
translation.es: uno al norte del callejónpor la Quinta Avenida

translation.en: and one on the first floor of the parking garage.
translation.es: y otro en el primer pisodel estacionamiento.

translation.en: -Your money's no good here. -Thanks.

translation.en: So I cut it my way.

translation.en: gets the full 500 grand.

translation.en: A girl like me,
translation.es: Siendo su novia,

translation.es: sabía de la reputación de Joede siempre ir por el gran premio.

translation.en: Even when he worked all the angles, the chips never fell his way.

translation.en: [Claire] I played enough three-card Monte to know
translation.es: He jugado muchoal Juego de tres cartas, para saber

translation.en: that short-term cons don't pay out long-term.

translation.es: es poner una pequeña trampay los demás harán el resto. Hagámoslo.

translation.en: Please hurry. They just shot my manager!

translation.en: Let's get to Claire and get the fuck out of this city.

translation.en: Oh, shit! Fuck.
translation.es: Demonios.

translation.es: - Muévete para allá.- ¿Qué carajo haces?

translation.en: -Toss me the case. -We don't have time for this!
translation.es: - Aviéntame el maletín.- No tenemos tiempo para esto.

translation.en: I will not hesitate to kill him.

translation.en: Jesus.
translation.es: Dios.

translation.en: I don't have the key. Bullshit!
translation.es: - No tengo la llave.- ¡Mentira!

translation.en: I don't have it. It wasn't part of the plan.

translation.en: Can he open this? I brought you in on this thing.

translation.en: [sighs] For pennies on the dollar, baby. No, thanks.
translation.es: Por solo unos centavos, cariño.No, gracias.

translation.en: Now, tell me, can your brother open this or not?

translation.en: You greedy bitch.

translation.en: I wasted ten years of my life in that bar.

translation.en: And for what?

translation.en: A finder's fee every time guys like you took down a big score?

translation.en: I just didn't count on you surviving.

translation.en: But I figured I could always use someone to help me cover my tracks.

translation.es: El jefe nos enviará a Ivory.

translation.en: and I don't want to be a part of any of that shit.

translation.en: That's probably Rex's boys trying to squeeze me to come in.
translation.es: Ha de ser uno de los chicos de Rexpara obligarme a ir.

translation.en: Sorry, baby. It's a bitter little world.

translation.en: Why didn't you just shoot me when you had the chance?

translation.en: Never walk into a place you don't know how to get out of.
translation.es: No entro a ningún lugara menos que sepa cómo saldré.

translation.en: Sound familiar?

translation.en: I've got what you're looking for. Case is secure.
translation.es: Tengo lo que buscas.El maletín está asegurado.

translation.en: [Claire in distorted voice] Same deal as before.
translation.es: El mismo trato de siempre.500 mil dólares.

translation.en: Five hundred thousan dollars, 10 p.m., place TBD.
translation.es: El mismo trato de siempre.500 mil dólares. A las 10:00 p. m.Lugar: por determinarse.

translation.es: Levántate.

translation.en: -Frank! -[Frank] Hold on!
translation.es: - ¡Frank!- ¡Espera!

translation.en: I'm not going to ask you again.
translation.es: No te lo repetiré.

translation.en: -Jesus, like 30 minutes ago. -Where?
translation.es: - Dios, hace como 30 minutos.- ¿A dónde?

translation.es: No lo sé. Escuché algo de Union Station,eso es todo lo que sé.

translation.en: Jesus. What did you do?

translation.en: He went for a gun. I'm sorry!

translation.en: I just didn't count on you lasting this long.
translation.es: No contaba con que sobrevivieras tanto.

translation.en: Fuck it.

translation.es: Estamos en la zona en construcción.

translation.en: Diamonds.

translation.en: So much for honor among thieves.
translation.es: Hablando del honor entre ladrones.

translation.en: We'll call this a down payment on the next one.
translation.es: Digamos que este es un adelantopor el siguiente trabajo.

translation.en: Sorry about your brother.

translation.en: It's time to get back on the clock.
